text:
@HillaryClinton Older teachers should be replaced by younger substitutes. They can work from home, or go on unemployment/disability. It's funny how Dem's say the U.S. is stupid b/c we didn't do things like the rest of the world, but now when we are they say we shouldn't.
https://t.co/dUZ526yDsp
